definition: a cloth pad or dressing (with or without medication) applied firmly to some part of the body (to relieve discomfort or reduce fever), to squeeze or press together
details:
noun
- a cloth pad or dressing (with or without medication) applied firmly to some part of the body (to relieve discomfort or reduce fever)
verb
- to squeeze or press together
= example: to squeeze or press together
= synonyms: press
- to make more compact by or as if by pressing
= example: to make more compact by or as if by pressing
= synonyms: compact
